scripts.build:linux: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && for file in *.js; do terser "$file" --compress --mangle --output "dist/${file%.js}.min.js"; done
scripts.build:windows: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && mkdir dist && for %f in (*.js) do terser %f --compress --mangle --output dist/%~nf.min.js
scripts.build: node -e "process.platform === 'win32' ? require('child_process').execSync('npm run build:windows', {stdio: 'inherit'}) : require('child_process').execSync('npm run build:linux', {stdio: 'inherit'})"
